translations: 花的；植物的，植物群的；花似的

sentences.sentence: The ornate features of Buckingham Palace will be reflected on the cake, but most of the decorations will be floral, and each has a meaning.
sentences.translation: 白金汉宫的华丽特点将蛋糕上反映，但大部分的装饰品都将是花卉，而且每件都蕴含一定的意义。

sentences.sentence: Floral tributes were sent to the church.
sentences.translation: 敬献的鲜花已送往教堂。

sentences.sentence: In this living room we've mixed glorious floral prints.
sentences.translation: 在这客厅里我们将各种漂亮的花卉图案搭配在了一起。
